At one point, when it was clear we didn't have them, you had stated publicly that, "Yeah, but I know where they are.' And you discuss this in the book that you had misspoke. But how did we get it so wrong, number one. Do you think he had'em and shipped'em out in the lead up to the war? " Donald Rumsfeld : I don"t know for sure. We know he had them. call for unity in a speech following the Jan. 8 shootings in Arizona that killed six people and injured 13, including Sen. Bernie Sanders Gabrielle Giffords , D-Ariz. Patrick Leahy said he should reprise the "sense" of that speech because it's America's interest that we should be more concerned about than party interests. Democratic Sen. Bernie Sanders Peter Welch said he's sure Barack Obama will mention Gabrielle Giffords . The shooting rampage has prompted "a lot of reflection" among lawmakers about the tone of political debate.
